bibl.title: La lettre d'archive – Communication administrative et personnelle dans l'Antiquité proche-orientale et égyptienne. Actes du colloque de l'Université de Lyon 2, 9-10 juillet 2004
bibl.note: Introduction. - Types of letters and their place in ancient archives: 1. Non-official letters: private and business letters; - 2. Official letters; - 3. Subgenres; - 4. Topics. - Selective bibliography of documentary letters.
